channel.title: Linux on Dan Skaf
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Dan Skaf

item.title: User Systemd Service
item.description: Creating your own systemd services. I recently created a discord bot and was sick of putting it online each time my friends tried to use it. As most linux distributions come with systemd I decided to learn how to use it and solve my problem of forgetting to put the bot online each time. Though this blog post refers to a python script you can use it with any script or program of your choice.
